arts.ttl: David Ornstein provides decisive update on Paul Pogba to Man United whispers
arts.sum: Manchester United are considering making new additions to their midfield in the summer transfer window. Their struggles this season have been well documented and a big summer transfer window is needed in order to address some of the issues facing their squad. arts.ttl: LeBron James meets David Beckham in the Lakers-Warriors showdown
arts.sum: The four-time NBA champion linked up with soccer icon David Beckham, sparking excitement among fans of both sports. L os Angeles Lakers star LeBron James had a special encounter before his team's big game against the Golden State Warriors.

arts.ttl: What referee told Everton star after Liverpool controversy left David Moyes furious
arts.sum: Liverpool beat Everton 1-0 to move one step closer to the Premier League title but David Moyes was among those who had some questions over Diogo Jota's winning goal

arts.ttl: Steph Curry and Kendall Jenner join David Beckham at Inter Miami game in LA after soccer icon's 50th birthday bash
arts.sum: Beckham's team suffered defeat on the night at BMO Stadium, with Nathan Ordaz's second-half strike earning LAFC a narrow 1-0 cup victory over Miami front of an A-list crowd.

arts.ttl: Tom Brady's deal with David Beckham to remain controversial for fans
arts.sum: Besides Brady, attendees included basketball legend Shaquille O'Neal and soccer stars Lionel Messi, Jordi Alba, Sergio Busquets, and Luis Suarez - all of whom currently play for Inter Miami . In another Instagram Story, Brady shared a moment captured alongside both Beckham and O'Neal.

arts.ttl: “It’s amazing at Anfield” – David Moyes unimpressed after Everton defeat, even when admitting to Tarkowski fortune
arts.sum: Everton manager David Moyes has openly questioned the refereeing performance in the Merseyside derby defeat to Liverpool, suggesting Anfield may have affected their decisions. Moyes was speaking to Viaplay after the game, which was settled by Diogo Jota’s superb solo strike midway through the second half.
